html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-13902018-11-08
ActAeronautics Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canadian Aviation Regulations (Parts l and X — Greenhouse Gas Emissions from International Aviation — CORSIA)
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION REGULATIONS (PARTS I AND X – GREENHOUSE GAS EMISSIONS FROM INTERNATIONAL AVIATION – CORSIA), in order to implement in Canadian domestic law CORSIA and therefore, fulfilling Canada’s international obligations for Phase 1 of the initiative (i.e., monitoring, reporting and verification of CO2 emissions).
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0240 Publication Date: 2018-11-28
AttachmentsAttachment
